item.title: Build a Contents Management System (CMS) for a Hugo-based Blog using GitHub Actions
item.description: I recommend reading this article after reading the article below. GitHub + Hugo, effectively managing blogs As I said in the previous article, the second reason I tried to migrate the existing blog to a blogger was cumbersome writing. In the case of Jekyll, to build a blog, you need Ruby and Jekyll installed on Windows, Linux, or Mac. Let’s imagine The image of myself sipping coffee in a beautiful and secluded cafe.
